properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

properties.description: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.
properties.label: Resolution > Is Adaptive Grid

properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.
